name: Twilight Forest
description:
An entity existed. It could control the time and the space, the light and the shadow... This entity was sheltering  two entities in its interior: Shuo and Letna. Shuo wanted the heat, the light, the life.. the Sun. Letna wanted the cold, the darkness, the death... the Moon. Both fight since the origin of the time until they divided. Without this unity, all their power disappeared and they started a new fight.... To finish with the other one.

Twilight Forest is a competitive climber where only the Day(Shuo) or the Night(Letna) can win.

#####################################################

Game developed during Global Game Jam 2018

Bugs are to be expected

#####################################################
